name: This Visual Novel Exists.
description:
This project is a little experiment involving artificial intelligence applications, specifically those that can be used by basically anyone with an internet connection. Almost all of the things you will see, hear, and read throughout this visual novel are created by tools that you yourself can access, mostly for free.

All of the characters and backgrounds were created using an AI image generator. All of the music was composed using a neural network. Almost all of the writing in this project was done by various online writers and plot generators. 

Of course, human intervention occurred throughout every step of the process, but in terms of pure content creation, the majority of this project is machine-generated! If that sounds at all interesting to you and you aren't too disturbed with the idea of reading through dozens of pages of complete nonsense, then please consider downloading! Either way, thank you for reading!

Websites Used:

  • NovelAI (images, writing)
  • AI Dungeon (writing)
  • This Waifu Does Not Exist (writing)
  • Melobytes (music)
